name: Btrieval
short_description:
A tool for exporting data out of Btrieve databases without the need for installing Pervasive SQL.  If you do not have .DDF Files, this tool now contains a section to help you build the file specs. Files can be exported in Tab Delimited Format or Microsoft Excel.
This program was written in Visual Studio 2010 C#.

This program is released under the GNU General Public License.  See  http://www.gnu.org/licenses/

This project is still in alpha stages of testing, it works without a problem with my dataset, but might not work with all versions of Btrieve files at the moment.  If you run into issues, please submit your datafiles and I can update the program.
